page.title: 13A boy's Birthday,aged 11
page.content: 'On the 1st. June it was my birthday and I was 11. I had about 17 cards. Two of my cards had Freddie Spencer, the famous motorcyclist on. The night before I couldn't get to sleep with the excitement. In the morning I heard the mail come through the door and it was all for me. In the end I was given 13 pounds in money to spend but there were more cards to come. My Mum and Dad were going to take me to the Beefeater, which is a restaurant just outside Ashford. We hired a Ford Sierra car just for the occasion.'
